doc:
Michelle Hurst https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michelle_Hurst 0 Michelle Hurst (born June 1, 1942) is an American actress. She is perhaps best known for her role as Miss Claudette Pelage in the first season of the web television series Orange Is the New Black. Michelle_Hurst ( born June_1_,_1942 ) is an_American_actress . She is_perhaps_best_known for her_role as Miss_Claudette_Pelage in the_first_season of the_web_television_series_Orange Is the_New_Black .
